landing.title: Bitcoin Education Hub
landing.description: Bitcoin development, internship, and global communities. Everything you need to explore and connect in the world of Bitcoin.

development.title: Bitcoin Development
development.description: Explore development resources for Bitcoin, Lightning Network, and education.

bitcoin.title: Bitcoin
bitcoin.description: Browse key Bitcoin development resources — including libraries, APIs, utilities, and SDKs.

lightning.title: Lightning Network
lightning.description: Explore Lightning Network development resources — from libraries and SDKs to monitoring and routing tools.

education.title: Education
education.description: Access curated learning materials, tutorials, courses, certifications, and books for Bitcoin and Lightning Network development.

education.title: Bitcoin Education
education.description: Learn the philosophy and technology behind Bitcoin. Explore its fundamentals and mechanics through resources designed for everyone — from beginners to developers.

educators.title: Educators
educators.description: Discover leading Bitcoin educators and experts. Gain deeper insights through their courses, talks, and educational content.

books.title: Books
books.description: From essential reading for newcomers to advanced technical books — explore a curated selection to understand Bitcoin in depth.

materials.title: Learning Materials
materials.description: Access tutorials, guides, and video lessons that help you learn and practice Bitcoin at your own pace.

global.title: Global Communities
global.description: Explore Bitcoin centers, organizations, and communities across all continents

internship.title: Internship Program
internship.description: Join internship programs to deeply understand the technology and philosophy of Bitcoin while gaining hands-on experience through real projects. Learn Bitcoin development through lectures and mentoring, and experience contributing directly to the Bitcoin ecosystem through practical work.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a team of Bitcoin enthusiasts who are dedicated to educating people about Bitcoin and the Lightning Network.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.subtitle: This page is under construction
comingSoon.description: We're building something amazing for the Bitcoin community. Stay tuned for exciting updates and new features.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you are looking for does not exist.

errorPage.title: Oops! Something went wrong
errorPage.description: We're sorry, but something went wrong. Please try again later.

hero.title: Internship Program
hero.description: Join our mission to advance Bitcoin development worldwide through hands-on experience and mentorship.

status.description: We're always looking for passionate individuals interested in Bitcoin development. Check back soon for future opportunities!

expertise.title: Bitcoin Expertise
expertise.description: Learn from industry experts and gain deep understanding of Bitcoin technology and Lightning Network.

mentorship.title: Mentorship
mentorship.description: Work alongside experienced professionals in the Bitcoin development space with personalized guidance.

projects.title: Real Projects
projects.description: Contribute to meaningful projects that impact Bitcoin development globally and build your portfolio.

stayConnected.title: Stay Connected
stayConnected.description: Can't find the internship you're looking for? Explore our resources and join the Bitcoin development community.
